text.__SUMMARY__: Euphorbia clavarioides is a herbaceous plant species endemic to Botswana, Lesotho, and South Africa, which may grow to 18 cm in diameter, with a height of 30 cm. Flowers are yellow.
text.Synonyms:
Euphorbia basutica Marloth
Euphorbia clavarioides var. clavarioides
Euphorbia clavarioides var. truncata A.C.White, R.A.Dyer & B.Sloane
Euphorbia truncata N.E.Br. [Illegitimate]
text.References:
Cent. Euphorb. 25 1860.
The Plant List
Birhmann's Caudiciforms
